overview:
Minesh Mistry is the co-founder of SideTour, where he handles operations, finance and strategy.

Prior to co-founding SideTour, Minesh was a VP at General Atlantic LLC, a leading global growth equity firm. While at General Atlantic, Minesh was part of the two-person team that established the firmâ€™s Palo Alto office. He rejoined the firmâ€™s New York office after completing graduate school.

Before joining General Atlantic, Minesh was a member of Morgan Stanleyâ€™s Global Investment Banking Division, where he worked on a wide range of financial and strategic advisory transactions.

Minesh holds an MBA from the Harvard Business School and an MPA from the Harvard Kennedy School. He received his BS in Public Health from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, where he graduated with Honors.

degrees.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
